metadata.title: CVE-2023-52840 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: Input:synaptics-rmi4 - fix use after free in rmi_unregister_function() Theput_device() calls rmi_release_function() which frees "fn" so thedereference on the next line "fn->num_of_irqs" is a use after free. Movethe put_device() to the end to fix this.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
